lines.Line: Chandler!!! Chandler!!! lines.Character: (There's another pause as Ross gets angry again

lines.Line: Hey! I brought you some house warming gifts

3.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Joey is sitting on the couch with Katie.

lines.Line: You were so funny with that waiter! You're such a nut! (She slaps herNEWLINEthighs, Joey jerks, and spills some of his coffee.
(sets the coffee down) Y'know, breadstick fangs are always funny
No, you make them funny. You're the funny one! (She punches him again andNEWLINEhe retreats to the arm of the couch.

Uhh, look Katie, uh listen, we-we need to talk. Okay? Umm, look I likeNEWLINEyou. I-I really do, I like you a lot. Okay? But sometimes when you, when you playfullyNEWLINEpunch me like that it-it feels like someone's hitting me with a very tiny but very realNEWLINEbat

lines.Line: Hi! Wow! You look, you look…big

lines.Line: Obviously I didn't think they were gonna start throwing things. I justNEWLINEthought if I kept insulting everyone, you would jump in and defend everyone and then youNEWLINEcould look like the hero
